scenario_text.value: Wasn’t the lid on this box open at first?

Huh?! I thought I heard something from inside
that treasure chest!

No, no, no, no, no! I’m sure you just
imagined it!

I don’t think so. I swear I heard something
<color=#B41919>inside there</color>.

No way! Th-that was just me stumbling over
a pebble!
Are you sure that’s what it was?

Didn’t I just say so?! Now stop pestering me
and get out of here already!

Treasure chests don’t make noise! It totally
must’ve been your imagination!
